data.comment: Today's referee, Granit Maqedonci, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Mjallby in their own half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a Mjallby throw-in in Sirius's half.
In the minute 8, Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Mohanad Jeahze (Mjallby) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Mjallby.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Sirius have been awarded a penalty in Hallevik...
Sirius pushes forward through Yukiya Sugita, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 20, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Mohammed Saeid.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Hallevik to check on Jon Viscosi, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 21, Jon Viscosi is back on his feet again.
Can Mjallby get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Granit Maqedonci awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Sirius at Strandvallen.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 27, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Hallevik.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, David Lofquist for Mjallby gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sirius at Strandvallen.
Granit Maqedonci awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sirius.
In the minute 34, Mjallby to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
In the minute 35, Sirius have a goal kick.
Throw-in Mjallby.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Elias Andersson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Elias Andersson returns to the field for Sirius after picking up a slight injury.
Granit Maqedonci blows against Sirius's Adam Stahl for offside.
In the minute 44, Free kick Mjallby.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Mjallby.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Strandvallen.
In the minute 45, At Strandvallen, Adam Petersson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second half has started at Strandvallen.
Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 46, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Can Mjallby get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 51, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Adam Stahl for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sirius drives forward and Elias Andersson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Granit Maqedonci waits before resuming play because Adam Hellborg for Sirius is still down.
Laorent Shabani is replacing Adam Hellborg for the away team.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Joel Nilsson for Mjallby is whistled offside.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Mjallby.
In the minute 58, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
In Hallevik Mjallby drive forward through Jacob Bergstrom. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
In the minute 62, Jesper Lofgren of Mjallby smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
Granit Maqedonci signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Mjallby's area.
In the minute 64, Marcus Lantz (Mjallby) is making a first substitution, with Mamudo Moro replacing Adam Petersson.
The home team replace Jacob Bergstrom with Viktor Gustafson.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, In Hallevik, Mohammed Saeid of Sirius is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hallevik.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 69, Jesper Lofgren (Mjallby) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jesper Lofgren for Mjallby drives towards goal at Strandvallen. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sirius's Elias Andersson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 70, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Sirius.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Free kick Sirius.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 77, In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hallevik.
Marcus Lantz is making the team's third substitution at Strandvallen with Jonathan Tamimi replacing Jesper Gustavsson.
Mjallby make their fourth substitution with Taylor Silverholt replacing Joel Nilsson.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Jamie Roche is replacing Mohammed Saeid for Sirius at Strandvallen.
Mohanad Jeahze (Mjallby) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Granit Maqedonci signals a Sirius throw-in in Mjallby's half.
Moses Ogbu (Mjallby) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Sirius at Strandvallen.
In the minute 84, Mjallby to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Mjallby's Taylor Silverholt misses with an attempt on goal.
Granit Maqedonci awards Sirius a goal kick.
Goal! Moses Ogbu equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Sirius.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a Mjallby throw-in in Sirius's half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Mjallby are in shooting range from this free kick.
David Lofquist gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mjallby.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Free kick Sirius.
Granit Maqedonci blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Johan Karlsson is on a sub for Elias Andersson for Sirius.
Jesper Lofgren (Mjallby) has received a first yellow card.
